pages.text: $(li)Stonelings are passive creatures that can be found in caves of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They will spawn in carrying an item, and will get startled if you get too close to them without sneaking and holding a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/diamond)Diamond$(/l) to tempt them.$(br)$(li)If startled, they will run away from you and finally poof out of existence.

$(li)They will drop the item its carrying as well a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/quark/diamond_heart)Heart of Diamond$(/l) upon death.$(br)$(li)You can use this item to create tamed Stonelings.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are pointing to a Stone Block and you are holding it in your hand to create your own tamed Stoneling!
$(li)Tamed Stonelings can hold items you give them, eat Stone (they love it!), and follow you if you hold a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/diamond)Diamond$(/l).
